name: Wigwam Mount Katahdin Mid Crew Socks - Unisex
description: For trekking or just out for a stroll, dry feet are essential for blister prevention and comfort. These cushioned socks use Ultimax technology to move moisture away from your foot and spread it over the outside of the sock, where it evaporates fast.Ultimax® moisture control technology moves sweat to high evaporation areas to keep dry and comfortable.Mesh panel at the instep increases breathability.Cushioned sole lets you put in long days on the trail.Seamless toe closure keeps your feet hotspot free.
